goals__remit:
Object of activity: High Quality LED Producer, with applied R&D capabilities and cleanliness technology ISO1 area, including Computer Tomography and SEM facilities. 
Expectations: 
To find a partner that can open up new markets and can put to good use the company’s potential. 
To use the applied R&D facilities to expand the range of services and products. 
To make use of the existing facilities, either to enhance synergy with the partner, or as an offset to the market developing services offered by the partner.
